tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: Update patches references to the new folder names

script.lang: UPDATE AmpXmlPatch SET location=replace(location, '/2', '/2.0.') where location like '%xmlpatches/20%'
UPDATE AmpXmlPatch SET location=replace(location, '/2', '/2.0.') where location like '%xmlpatches/210/'
UPDATE AmpXmlPatch SET location=replace(location, '/21', '/2.1.') where location like '%xmlpatches/210%'
UPDATE AmpXmlPatch SET location=replace(location, '/2', '/2.0.') where location like '%xmlpatches/21%'
UPDATE AmpXmlPatch SET state=0 where state=4 and location like 'xmlpatches/2.%'
